name: University Medical System
description: Large academic medical center with integrated clinic retail operations and research divisions
healthcare_components: Inpatient hospital, ambulatory clinics, emergency department, teaching hospitals
non_covered_functions: Bookstore, gift shop, cafeteria, parking services, unrelated research
requirement: Hybrid entity must apply HIPAA to healthcare components only

name: Large Integrated Health System
description: Multi-facility healthcare organization with hospital clinics insurance plan and wellness programs
healthcare_components: Hospital system, physician practices, urgent care, health plan operations
non_covered_functions: Corporate headquarters non-healthcare, real estate leasing, unrelated ventures
requirement: Designate healthcare components subject to HIPAA

name: Provider-Sponsored Insurer
description: Healthcare provider that owns health insurance organization
healthcare_components: Clinical provider operations, health plan operations, claims processing
non_covered_functions: General insurance products, property casualty insurance
requirement: Components must comply with separate HIPAA requirements

name: Pharmaceutical Company with Patient Services
description: Drug manufacturer with direct patient assistance programs
healthcare_components: Patient assistance program, patient data collection, clinical support services
non_covered_functions: Drug manufacturing and sales, general business operations
requirement: Patient services component subject to HIPAA

name: Hospital with Non-Healthcare Subsidiary
description: Hospital owning property management and consulting companies
non_covered_functions: Property management company, consulting firm unrelated to healthcare
requirement: Only hospital component covered by HIPAA

name: Dental Network with Lab Services
description: Dental provider organization with owned lab and supply company
healthcare_components: Dental practices, patient care, clinical laboratories
non_covered_functions: Dental supply retail, equipment sales to non-healthcare
requirement: Clinical operations covered; supply retail not covered

name: Research Institute with Hospital
description: Academic research institution operating affiliated hospital,Clinical research hospital
column8: Hospital and clinical research covered; pure research may not be

name: Pharmacy Chain with Clinics
description: National pharmacy retailer with healthcare clinics
healthcare_components: Healthcare clinics, immunization services, medication counseling
non_covered_functions: Retail pharmacy counter, beauty services, grocery operations
requirement: Clinic operations covered; retail pharmacy may have separate obligations

name: Employer with Onsite Medical Clinic
description: Company with self-funded health plan and employee medical clinic
healthcare_components: Onsite occupational health clinic, health plan administration
non_covered_functions: Corporate headquarters, employee benefits services unrelated to healthcare
requirement: Medical clinic and health plan are healthcare components

name: Mental Health Center with Social Services
description: Community mental health provider with affiliated social services agency
healthcare_components: Mental health treatment, psychiatric care, counseling
non_covered_functions: Social services unrelated to mental health treatment, case management
requirement: Mental health treatment covered; general social services evaluated separately
